title: 1.12.2崩
author: logic_lyq
txt_content:

Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge

// Everything's going to plan. No, really, that was supposed to happen.

Time: 2/25/20 10:15 AM
Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail

replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content:
删除toughasnails(意志坚定mod)的配置文件即可
或者直接删掉这个mod

replies.author: 烈M煞
replies.txt_content: 可能是一键整理的问题

replies.author: JerryZRF
replies.txt_content: 你这个一键整理在哪里下的，下载下来叫什么名字

replies.author: logic_lyq
replies.txt_content:
EmptyLava 发表于 2020-2-25 10:17
删除toughasnails(意志坚定mod)的配置文件即可
或者直接删掉这个mod
多谢了
